title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Fry pancetta with garlic until crispy.
Beat eggs and Parmesan in a bowl.
Drain pasta, then mix with pancetta.
Remove from heat and quickly stir in egg mixture.
Serve with extra Parmesan and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a buttery & creamy tomato gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste for at least 1 hour.
Grill chicken pieces until golden brown.
Fry onions and garlic until soft.
Stir in cream and grilled chicken.
Simmer for 10 minutes and serve with rice.
